char_info.char_desc: The Siren Who Swims at Fast Speeds

t_scene_info.speaker: Kisumi:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I'll plead with you, my Majesty. Their power may be unimaginable.

t_scene_info.speaker: Marisa:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Didn't Kagami tell me that when I was about to enter some church to shut down a stormy concert?

t_scene_info.speaker: Kagami:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Yeah, I did. Are you heading off to the Palace of Eternity?

t_scene_info.speaker: Marisa:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Yes. In fact, Eirin told me about a vitamin that acts like fertilizer for hair.

t_scene_info.speaker: Kisumi:
t_scene_info.dialogue: So, this is how you became the Queen of your own kingdom...
